item.title: FOREX-'Buy Japan' talk boosts yen towards best week in a year
item.author: EBR European Business Report
item.description:
*
Yen surges since Takaichi wins landslide poll victory
*
Analysts say mood may be shifting on Japan
*
Aussie hits 3-year high on hawkish RBA; yuan on weekly streak
(Updates to Asia afternoon)
By Tom Westbrook
SINGAPORE, Feb 12 (Reuters) - A resurgent yen rode towards its biggest weekly gain...
